name: 真乃
text: あ……灯織ちゃん
trans: Ah, Hiori.

name: 灯織
text:
……？
真乃？　どうしたの、こんなところで
trans: Mano? What are you doing here?

name: 真乃
text:
私は、お散歩してたところだよ
灯織ちゃんは？
trans:
I was just walking around.
How about you, Hiori?

name: 灯織
text: ちょっとＣＤショップに行こうとしてただけ
trans: I was just on my way to a CD shop.

name: 真乃
text: ＣＤショップ……かぁ
trans: CD shop, you say.

name: 真乃
text: あの……私もついて行ってもいいかな？
trans: Umm... Is it alright if I come along?

name: 灯織
text: え？　……まぁ、別にいいけど
trans: Eh? Well, I don't mind.

name: 真乃
text: わぁ、ありがとう
trans: Oh, thank you.

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……ＣＤショップ、面白かった～
いろんなＣＤがたくさんあったね
trans:
Aah, the CD shop is so interesting.
They have so many CDs in there.

name: 灯織
text: ……ＣＤショップなんだから当たり前でしょ
trans: That's to be expected since they are a CD shop.

name: 真乃
text: えへへ……そうだよね
trans: Ehehe You're right.

name: 灯織
text:
（……誰かとこんな風に休日を過ごすのは
いつぶりだろう）
trans: (I wonder how long has it been when I last spent a day-off with someone.)

name: 灯織
text:
（いつもみたいにそっけなくしちゃってるけど、
真乃は私といて楽しいのかな……）
trans: (I'm probably acting aloof like I always do but, I wonder if Mano enjoys being with me.)

name: 真乃
text: ほわ！　ねえ、灯織ちゃん
trans: Ah! Say, Hiori.

name: 灯織
text: 何？
trans: What is it?

name: 真乃
text:
あそこにいる男の子……迷子じゃないかな
ひとりで、泣いてるみたいで……
trans:
That boy over there. I was wondering he got lost.
He seems to be just by himself and crying.

name: 灯織
text: ……早く交番に連れて行こう
trans: Let's hurry and bring him to the nearest police box.

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そうだよね……！
早く行かなくちゃ……！
trans:
R-Right!
We need to hurry!

name: 灯織
text: ふぅ……あの子の親も交番にいてよかった
trans: Whew I'm glad that the parent of that boy also headed to the police box.

name: 真乃
text: ……ふふっ
trans: Fufu

name: 灯織
text: ……急に笑って、何？
trans: Why did you laugh all of a sudden?

name: 真乃
text: ううん、灯織ちゃんは優しいなと思って
trans: I was just thinking of how nice you are.

name: 灯織
text: ……別に、優しくなんてないでしょ
trans: ...No, I'm not that nice really.

name: 真乃
text: ううん、そんなことないよ
trans: That's not true.

name: 真乃
text:
だって、あの男の子が迷子になって
泣いていたとき……
trans: When we saw that lost boy crying,

name: 真乃
text:
すぐに交番に連れていこうって
言ってくれたのは、灯織ちゃんだよ
trans: You said that we should bring him to the police box right away.

name: 灯織
text: あれくらい、当然でしょ
trans: It's only natural to do that.

name: 灯織
text: ……まぁ、好きに考えれば
trans: ...But, you're free to think whatever you like about it.
